description.description: An offensive defender that neutralizes surrounding enemies and enhances himself after a number of attacks

introduction.introduction:
Sol Badguy is a Defender who can temporarily enhance himself and incapacitate surrounding enemies, depending on the number of attacks he delivers.

  He claims to be a bounty hunter, but his primary target is Gears, the bionic weapons scattered everywhere in the world. The way he fights, destroying his enemies with brute force instead of technique, is possible because he's a Gear himself.
  This simulated version of him seems just as brusque and aloof as his original. Still, he has to have a humane side that's been formed during his hitherto turbulent life.

pve.notes: Sol can get 100% uptime on his Special Skill buff with a bit of Skill Haste.

pvp.notes: Sol can get 100% uptime on his Special Skill buff with a bit of Skill Haste.

baseDescription.baseDescription: Throws punches at nearby targets and shoots flames at distant ones.

After every 5th attack, he is able to cancel his current move and do something else. Forces surrounding units to target him and decreases their ASPD by 30% for 6 seconds. (Attack count persists through deployments.) Additionally, increases ATK and Skill Haste by 3% for every Guilty Gear unit on the battlefield in PVE (up to 18%).

level5.level5: Special skill cooldown -4 s added to Passive skill, ATK -30% added to debuff

baseDescription.baseDescription: Punches enemies in front, inflicting AoE damage. Increases DMG RDC by 30% for 10 seconds when cast.

level5.level5: Buff also adds immunity to Hitsun from Special or lower skills.

baseDescription.baseDescription: Transforms into an otherworldly form and lunges at a target, inflicting AoE damage on and around it. Restores 33% of HP over 12 seconds after this skill.
